objects.specification: An invisible structural container defining the room volume and grouping all classroom elements, with neutral internal surfaces.
A continuous flat floor slab with a light neutral tone and subtle textured finish, suitable for classroom use.
A smooth overhead ceiling panel painted in a light neutral color to reflect light evenly across the room.
A straight vertical wall finished in a light neutral paint, with a smooth surface and minimal architectural detail.

A standard classroom door with a simple flat panel design, light wood grain finish, narrow frame and rectangular shape.
A large rectangular teacher’s desk crafted from darker wood with a smooth work surface, sturdy rectangular legs, modesty panel and classic academic styling.
An ergonomic teacher’s chair with padded seat and backrest, supportive contours, sturdy base and subtle fabric upholstery in a neutral tone.
A large rectangular wall-mounted blackboard with a dark matte writing surface and slim metal frame, classic classroom style.
A compact student desk with a smooth light wood finish top, four straight legs and modesty panel, designed for classroom use.
